Title: Financial Management Studio
Description: This is a WPF application for the financial management. Will use bunch of technologies such as: MVVM, Microsoft Extension Framework and Entities Framework.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a WPF application for the financial management.Will use bunch of technologies such as: MVVM, Microsoft Extension Framework and Entities Framework. Also will use Blend creates awesome the user interface with animation. And split each function into an assembly for the maintainability of the software. Try to implement the analysis the data; different type of chart; automation task; notification trigger; import/export the data and output report.
